descriptions: It will be sunny, time to go to the beach.

Expect to see some sun.
Expect to see some sun, so bring your sunglasses.
There will be rain!
Rain is expected!
Rain is coming, bring an umbrella!
Rain is coming, put on the raincoat!
The sky will be clear!
Expect to see some fog.
Expect to see some fog, so drive carefully.
It will be snowy, time to build a snowman.

Thunderstorms are expected!
Thunderstorms are expected, so stay inside and watch a movie!

It will be cloudy.
Expect to see some clouds.
It will be overcast.
Sleet is expected!
